Articles.Content:
Now Presenting, Black Diamond Productions!

We are working hard to get ships out to the people! A simple order only costs 100000 Kerbal Dollars! Buy now and get 1%

less used prices free, yes free!

The first craft is the Black Diamond, a simple stock rocket meant to be used by beginners to experience the feel of a rocket. It is very simple and needs really no training except for the tutorial and rcs knowledge.

Link for pictures of ship: http://imgur.com/giJHD

More rockets will be added soon so I hope you enjoy my first simple rocket on Black Diamond Productions.

-Update!

Check the bottom of the post for the newest craft, the Black Sun!

Edited August 27, 2012 by TheKerb321
Nice! It's very easy to control and can get quite far. Definitely good for beginners!

Looks good, certainly better than my rocket I built yesterday, where I used solar powered Ion engines, and it took about a week to get into Munar orbit. Or it would have, if I'd not got bored and built a jet instead =D

Thanks! I appreciate the feedback and am quite happy with this "first good post"

Oh, and thanks for feedback One, your a great builder!

Now presenting the Black Sun! (STOCK)

Check here for pictures and the logo of the ship!

Pilot wasn't very happy, don't know why? :3

Link for pictures: http://imgur.com/a/5Ast4

This is a beginner-medium plane that also functions as a glider at times! The ship is efficient and is useful for recon.

To fly, you just need to keep it stable and when it reaches the end of the runway, it takes off! From there you are home free and are free to do as you wish as long as you aren't keeping it on S.A.S too long.

More will be coming soon!

Almost forgot the craft XD

Edited August 26, 2012 by TheKerb321
